YPO001-DN349376-94533563,Contract,YPO,Awarded,2018-10-22T10:40:25Z,"YPO - 000913 Litter Bins and Street Furniture","YPO are looking for providers to be appointed onto a Catalogue Framework Agreement for the provision of
Litter bins and Street Furniture for use primarily in the education market. This Framework is designed to allow
YPO to meet the needs of all public and private sector organisations by establishing an agreement for providers
to deliver to YPO customers on a direct basis whereby the end customer places the order with YPO and
YPO places the order with the provider but the provider delivers direct to the end customer. The Framework
Agreement will cover the period from 1.9.2018 to 31.08.2022. The Framework has an estimated value of

between 3 000 000 GBP - 4 000 000 GBP for the maximum life of the contract.",,,"Yorkshire and the Humber","34928480 ","Contracts Team",contracts@ypo.co.uk,"41 Industrial Park",,Wakefield,"WF2 0XE","United Kingdom","+44 1924664685",https://procontract.due-north.com/,,,,01/09/2018,31/08/2022,27/07/2018,NO,,Yes,Yes,No,Products,3000000,4000000,15/08/2018,4000000,"[Broxap Limited

column1: TD1282,Contract,"Derby City Council",Awarded,2018-04-04T11:12:51Z,"The Supply of Litter Bins on Derby City Streets and Open Air Spaces","The Authority requires Litter Bins (the Goods) for streets and open-air spaces in the City of Derby in a range of designs that are, in style and colour, of a sufficient similarity to the current stock so as not to detract from the consistency of quality and character that already exists.
It is imperative that a 13mm hex key will open all types of bin excluding the post mounted version.

Please note, the deadline for returns is is 10:00 Thursday 4th January 2018. It is recommended that you express interest and obtain the documentation well before this time to allow sufficient time to prepare and submit a comprehensive response.

Select the 'apply online' link in this notice, this will transfer you to the Councils e-tendering system https://www.eastmidstenders.org where you can express interest and obtain the documents.",,,"East Midlands","34928480 ","TD1282 - For the supply of Litter Bins on Derby City Streets and",procurement@derby.gov.uk,"Derby City Council","The Council House, Corporation Street,",Derby,"DE1 2FS",England,"01332 64 0768",,,"https://www.eastmidstenders.org ",,01/03/2018,28/02/2021,04/01/2018,YES,TD1282,Yes,Yes,No,Products,0,100000,31/03/2018,80000,"[BROXAP LIMITED

ESPO001-DN343688-64524968,Contract,ESPO,Awarded,2018-11-14T11:11:33Z,"235_19 Sports Equipment","Supply of sports equipment for stock and direct delivery; including Badminton, Basketball, Football, Hockey, Rugby, Table Tennis, Volleyball, Cricket, Tennis, Squash, Table Sports, Nets, Posts and others.  For bulk delivery to the ESPO Distribution Centre, Leicester and direct delivery to End User Establishments.
Lot 11: Table Tennis and Table Sports
Lot 13: Line Marking, Boot Cleaners, Storage & Water Bottles
The framework agreement has the option to extend for up to a further 23 months. The total estimated value stated includes the option period.
An eAuction process may be used to award subsequent call off contracts following the reopening of competition among the parties to the Framework Agreement.

As a Central Purchasing Body as defined by the EU Procurement Directive 2014/24/EU, the Framework Agreement is open for use by Public Bodies (defined https://www.espo.org/ESPO/media/Documents/FAQs/ESPO-s_powers_to_trade__website_-2016-12-22.pdf) that also fall into one of the following classifications of user throughout all administrative regions of the UK: Local Authorities; Educational Establishments (including Academies); Central Government Departments and Agencies; Police, Fire & Rescue and Coastguard Emergency Services; NHS and HSC Bodies, including Ambulance Services; Registered Charities; Registered Social Landlords; or any public body established by or under the Scotland Act 1998 or any Act of the Scottish Parliament. Details of the classification of end user establishments and geographical areas is available on: http://www.espo.org/About-us-%281%29/FAQs/Legal
To tender: (a) Go to www.eastmidstenders.org, (b) Register (c) Search for tender opportunity '235_19' d) Express an interest (e) Download the tender from the website.

Please note, the closing date for submission of tenders is 12:00 midday, 14/08/2018",,,"Any region","37400000 ","Mrs Anna ellis",tenders@espo.org,"Barnsdale Way, Grove Park",Enderby,Leicester,"LE19 1ES",England,"+44 1162657850",http://www.espo.org/,,,"To tender: (a) Go to www.eastmidstenders.org, (b) Register (c) Search for tender opportunity '235_19' d) Express an interest (e) Download the tender from the website.
Please note, the closing date for submission of tenders is 12:00 midday, 14/08/2018
